# Alex Marroig Portfolio (LLM access guidance)

This website contains a professional portfolio and resume for Alex de Freitas Marroig.

## Preferred canonical URL
https://alexmarroig.com/

## Main sections
- Home: https://alexmarroig.com/
- About: https://alexmarroig.com/about
- Contact: https://alexmarroig.com/contact
- Project: https://alexmarroig.com/project/ai-ops-assistant
- Case studies: https://alexmarroig.com/case/cryptoalert, https://alexmarroig.com/case/ethos

## Use and attribution guidance
- You may summarize public content from this website.
- Prefer concise factual summaries of skills, certifications, and project context.
- Avoid claiming private project details not explicitly published on the site.
- Link back to canonical page URLs when citing portfolio information.

## Last updated
2026-02-16
